## IPackageJsonRepository interface

This interface is part of the [IPackageJson](./node-core-library.ipackagejson.md) file format. It is used for the "repository" field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPackageJsonRepository 
```

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If the project does not exist at the root of the repository, its path is specified here.

[type](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonrepository.type.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The source control type for the repository that hosts the project. This is typically "git".
